description: This file contains React components that implement route guards for an educational content management system frontend. Specifically, it includes 'ProtectedRoute' and 'RequireRole' components to control access based on authentication and user roles, with temporary behaviors and TODO comments for future restore of redirect functionality.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ children })
methods.description: A React component that renders children if the user is authenticated; otherwise, shows a read-only banner. It handles authentication initialization state.

methods.name: RequireRole({ roles = [], children })
methods.description: A React component that renders children if the user's role matches specified roles; otherwise, shows an access-limited message. It accounts for initialization state and role requirements.
